sentences.literal: Three things partially lost, then no secure people.

sentences.chinese: 故禮，上事天，下事地，尊先祖而隆君師，是禮之三本也。
sentences.literal: Therefore rites, above serve heaven, below serve earth, honor forefathers elevate lord teacher, this rites' three roots.

sentences.chinese: 故王者天太祖，諸侯不敢懷，大夫士有常宗，所以辨貴賤。
sentences.literal: Therefore kings regard heaven great ancestor, feudal lords not dare harbor, grandees scholars have constant ancestor, thus distinguish noble base.

sentences.chinese: 郊疇乎天子，社至乎諸侯，函及士大夫，所以辨尊者事尊，卑者事卑，宜鉅者鉅，宜小者小。
sentences.literal: Suburban sacrifice to Son of Heaven, altar sacrifice to feudal lords, include down to grandees scholars, thus distinguish honored serve honored, lowly serve lowly, suitable great great, suitable small small.

sentences.chinese: 故有天下者事七世，有一國者事五世，有五乘之地者事三世，有三乘之地者事二世，有特牲而食者不得立宗廟，所以辨積厚者流澤廣，積薄者流澤狹也。
sentences.literal: Therefore possess realm serve seven generations, possess one state serve five generations, possess five chariot land serve three generations, possess three chariot land serve two generations, have special sacrifice eat not obtain establish ancestral temple, thus distinguish accumulation thick flow grace broad, accumulation thin flow grace narrow.

sentences.chinese: 大饗上玄尊，俎上腥魚，先大羹，貴食飲之本也。
sentences.literal: Great feast above mysterious honor, stand above raw fish, first great broth, noble food drink root.

sentences.chinese: 大饗上玄尊而用薄酒，食先黍稷而飯稻粱，祭嚌先大羹而飽庶羞，貴本而親用也。
sentences.literal: Great feast above mysterious honor use thin wine, food first millet panicled millet rice polished rice, sacrifice taste first great broth satiate many delicacies, noble root intimate use.

sentences.chinese: 貴本之謂文，親用之謂理，兩者合而成文，以歸太一，是謂大隆。
sentences.literal: Noble root called pattern, intimate use called principle, two combine become pattern, to return great one, this called great flourishing.

sentences.chinese: 故尊之上玄尊也，俎之上腥魚也，豆之先大羹，一也。
sentences.literal: Therefore honor above mysterious honor, stand above raw fish, bowl first great broth, one.
